content:
<rule id="springboot-integration-to-quarkus-00020" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlow">
                  <location>IMPORT</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="5" title="SpringBoot IntegrationFlow class usage is not supported.">
                    <message>
                        SpringBoot IntegrationFlow class usage is not supported. A migration to Apache Camel route using From is mandatory.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/camel" title="Quarkus Apache Camel"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
